name: Virtuemart to woocoommerce
author: onliner

sections.description:
Virtuemart to woocoommerce
this plugin imports products, medias, product categories, product attributes from virtuemart to woocommerce

Features

  • Import all product categories
  • Import all product relations
  • Import all products
  • Import all product medias
  • Import all product attributes

Compatibility

  • Woocommece 3.4.x
  • Woocommece 3.5.x
  • WordPress 4.9.x

Support

Fa

این افزونه کلیه محصولات و دسته بندی های محصولات + رسانه ها و ویژگی های محصولات را از ویرچومارت به ووکامرس منتقل میکند.

Traducciones

You can read complete documentations on the on5.ir
sections.installation:
1. Upload virtuemart2woocommerce folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where can I find more information and documentation about the plug-in?

You can read complete documentations on the woocommerce.ir
